dict.string:
Otis CompassPlus™ destination management system integrates with Lenel OnGuard® building access system to optimize traffic flow and floor access
Otis integrates with Interlogix TruVision® cameras to dispatch elevators based on crowd size
All critical elevator functions are monitored 24/7 by Otis
Data gathering allows for custom service visits
Identify issues before they become problems
Technicians are dispatched automatically for urgent issues
Gen2® elevators with ReGen™ drives use up to 75% less energy than conventional elevators
Advanced ReGen™ drive technology turns gravity into energy
Small enough to fit inside the wall at top elevator landing
No need to plan extra room at top of hoistway
Much easier access for diagnostics and repair

Doors open quietly and quickly - as fast as 1.4 seconds
Greatly reduced floor-to-floor travel times equals less wait time
Direct drive technology means fewer moving parts and less maintenance
Sleep mode powers down lights and fans when idle
LED lights save energy and last 10 times longer
Coated steel belts create a remarkably smooth ride
New machine is 70% smaller than conventional geared machines
Machine actually fits inside the hoistway, eliminating machine room

Interlogix TruVision cameras integrate with Edwards EST3 platform and Automated Logic WebCTRL to detect and see where a fire is located
Interlogix TruVision cameras integrate with Otis to dispatch elevators based on crowd size
Monitors and controls life safety network information via graphic display
Provides valuable data and response options to building operators and first responders
Integrates with Lenel OnGuard® building access system to efficiently mass notify and evacuate a building
Integrates with Automated Logic WebCTRL® and Interlogix TruVision® cameras to detect and see where a fire is located
Life Safety System & Incident Mgmt. System
Detects and communicates life safety events; tells first responders location of emergency events
Communicates live or recorded messages for fire and mass notification events
Can be remotely diagnosed prior to arriving on-site, better preparing service providers
Signature data loop connects pull stations and smoke, heat, and CO detectors to the system control panel
Sensors provide diagnostics and reporting for planned and immediate service response needs
Photoelectric smoke chambers and replaceable CO cartridges provide life cycle cost savings

Edwards EST3 platform integrates with Lenel OnGuard building access system to efficiently mass notify and evacuate a building
Edwards EST3 platform integrates with Automated Logic WebCTRL and Interlogix TruVision cameras to detect and see where a fire is located
Protects data, telecommunications and other critical environments
Discharges as a gas, reaching all areas while leaving no residue
Agent cylinders stored away from protected area, saving floor space
System performance enhances design flexibility in complex piping configurations
Designed for commercial cooking areas; faster flame knockdown and fire suppression
Ergonomic aluminum handles with wide pull pin for ease of use
Easy-to-service, corrosion-resistant metal for long life
Offers interior, electronic access control solutions
Provides facility management solutions such as electronic locks, in-room safes, and energy-management systems
